## finna-pk client provider list

List configured providers

```
finna-pk client provider list [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  finna-pk client provider list
```

### Options

```
      --config-path string   Path to the client config file. Default: ~/.finna-pk/config.yml on linux and %APPDATA%\.finna-pk\config.yml on windows.
  -h, --help                 help for list
```
